subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Marcus Lattimore ran for two touchdowns and 110 yards, and Connor Shaw ran for 92 yards while playing with an injured shoulder as No. 9 South Carolina rallied for a 17-13 victory against Vanderbilt.
snippet: Marcus Lattimore ran for two touchdowns and 110 yards, and Connor Shaw ran for 92 yards while playing with an injured shoulder as No. 9 South Carolina rallied for a 17-13 victory against Vanderbilt.
